1.content: So which character combo are we going to be follow?
1.title: A Siblings Revenge

choices: Jason his sister picks on him for being small
Sarah her brother picks on her for still wetting the bed
Sarah her brother picks on her to feel superior
11.content:
Jason is fifteen years old and has a stunted growth from poor diet and is only a little taller than his seven year old sister Sarah

Before we start which sibling is the one getting revenge?
11.title: Jason & Sarah

112.content:
Sarah was sick and tired of her big brother Jason always picking on her for still wetting the bed she was seven for goodness sake it’s not like she was a teen who wet the bed that would be far worse in her mind

Than she got an idea what if her brother started to wet the bed than maybe he wouldn’t pick on her for it as much since he would be too worried about his own problem to continue to pick on her about it

So that night she set an alarm on her watch to wake her up later during the night so that she could put her plan into motion so she slept during her normal bed time after putting on her nighttime protection so that nobody would get suspicious of her

The minute her watch hit 1 am her alarm started to beep and Sarah quickly turns the alarm off not wanting to risk waking anyone up then she headed to the kitchen grabbed a glass bowl and filled it with lukewarm water and grabbed a tea towel than carefully carried the stuff up to her big brothers room making sure not to make any noise

Jason was a heavy sleeper so she knew that she couldn’t wake him up easily but she still didn’t want to risk it, Sarah creeps over to her sound asleep brother and carefully took his hand and put it in the bowl like she heard kids at school talk about and hoped that this worked on her brother

Does it work?
112.title: Sarah her brother picks on her for still wettin...

choices: Jason cleans his bedding and pajamas
Mom comes in to wake him up
1121.content:
Jason’s hand was in the water for about ten minutes as Sarah was making sure that it was in enough to work she pulled his blanket back and saw that actually worked on him, Sarah than wiped the water from his hand and put the stuff away so that she didn’t leave any evidence

While she was up Sarah decided to go to the bathroom before going back to bed and sleeping again it took a little while for her to get to sleep from the adrenaline she had from the thought of her brother waking up and catching her in the act or her mother waking up and seeing what she was doing

............................................................................ ................................................................................ ..................................

The next morning Jason wakes up earlier than usual and immediately feels a cold and damp sensation not use to the feeling and still half a sleep he decided to see what it could be so he pulled his blanket and sheet back and sees a massive wet patch on the sheets and his pajama bottoms were soaked and some of the bottom half of his pajama top was wet too
1121.title: Yes

choices: Put them in the dryer to dry them
Hang them on the clothes line
Hang the bedding on the clothes line and put the clothes in the dryer
11211.content:
Upon noticing this he panicked and thought to himself 'how did this happen I haven’t wet the bed since I was five I am fifteen this cannot be happening to me', so as quickly as he could he removed his bedding and flipped his mattress than headed to the laundry room then put the bedding his pajamas and underwear in the wash and put put laundry powder in the machine than started it

After putting on the washing machine with his bedding, pajamas and underwear he rushed off to his room naked hoping nobody sees him and luckily nobody did so he grabbed some clean clothes and went to the bathroom for a shower making sure to scrub himself clean

Once out of the shower and into his clothes Jason decided to head to the lounge room to watch tv since he was the only one up so he sat down and turned on the tv to pass the time he channel surfed for a little while before settling on morning cartoons since nothing better was on

After watching cartoons for a while he heard the washing machine go off letting him know that the washing was done so he got up and pulled his stuff out of the washing machine and deciding to
11211.title: Jason cleans his bedding and pajamas

choices: Wet like usual no surprise there
112113.content:
Jason decided not to risk his mother seeing the bedding and clothes together and figuring out that he wet the bed so he decided to hang out his bedding and put his clothes in the dryer so first Jason put his clothes in the dryer and put the bedding in a clothing basket and hanging them on the clothes line

While Jason was outside hanging out his bedding Sarah woke up and looked at the time and was surprised that she had slept in today so she jumped out of bed and checked her Goodnite knowing that her mom would be asking if the was dry or not like usual and found that it was
112113.title: Hang the bedding on the clothes line and put th...

choices: Jason was still hanging his bedding
Jason was making himself a coffee
1121131.content:
Sarah checked her Goodnite expecting it to be wet like usual but was surprised to see that she was dry for once and guessed that it was because she went to the bathroom before going back to bed last night she was so excited to be dry for once that she quickly looked for her mother to show her so that she could finally get out of the Goodnite

She looks around the house trying to find her mom but before she could do that she wanted to check her brother and embarrass him so she went to his room and quietly opened the door and crept inside but much to her disappointment he wasn't asleep and his bed stripped of its bedding

So she just looked for her mother to tell her the good news she wasn't anywhere around the house so the figured that her mother was still in bed

............................................................................ ................................................................................ ..............................

Kate was sleeping peacefully in bed when she hears excited knocking on her bedroom door and hears someone open it waking her up she rubs the sleep from her eyes and looks to see her daughter rushing over to her

"Mom, Mom I was dry" Sarah says excitedly

Kate hears this but would only believe it when she saw it herself "Let me see sweetie" she replies

Sarah lifted up her nightie to show her mother that it was dry and let her check it herself and Kate beams at her daughter and says "Congratulations on being dry for the night to celebrate your first dry night I am going to make pancakes for breakfast"

Sarah left her mother's room to let her get dressed and rushed over to her own room to finally get out of the Goodnite and into some panties and got dressed for the day

Sarah leaves her room and sees her mother dressed and making her way to the kitchen to make breakfast knowing that this would take a while she decided to see what her brother was doing
1121131.title: Dry much to her excitement

choices: John he was sick of Joan and her friends picking on him
Joan she was sick of John pranking her
John he was sick of Joan always belittling him
12.content:
John and Joan were twins they were both seventeen years old and total opposites of eachother while one was athletic the other was not, while one was outgoing and popular the other was reserved and unpopular

Who was the one getting revenge?
12.title: John & Joan

info.description:
You choose a character combo and tell the story of how the sibling gets revenge on their brother or sister will the sibling get away with it, will older sibling know that the sibling is doing it is all up to you

Are you going to follow the sibling getting revenge or the sibling who is copping the revenge that is up to you point of views can change during story
